name: Witcher 3 HUD
description: A reimagination of the way The Witcher 3 Stamina Bar is placed for the sake of gameplay comfort and quick understanding of the current state Geralt abilities are in.
roles: UX research, UI Design & Motion Animation

problem.paragraph: In the Witcher 3 there is constant and frenetic combat. While you are destroying another folks you may aswell pay attention to the state of your character and his abilities.
In the Witcher 3 there is constant and frenetic combat. While you are destroying another folks you may aswell pay attention to the state of your character and his abilities.

solution.paragraph: Basing on references of others game modern approaches to the issue, decided to move the dynamic Hud elements to a more centric part of the screen, making them easy to track at all moments.

requirements.requirement: More redability of the user interface.

solution_media.note: Bocetos de re-posicionamente de la barra de energia y habilidades

final.paragraph: The project wrapped up in a reactive version of the Stamina Bar that moves dynamicly with the player, letting him now at every moment the state of Geralt, but not being distracting.

conclusion.paragraph: Me paro sobre los hombros de gigantes que admiro al plantear el rediseño de la experiencia de usuario de este videojuego.
Sin embargo, siempre hay cabida a la mejora y al final del día de esto se trata. Estas propuestas buscan hacer aún mejor una experiencia de por si ya es extraordinaria.
